title: Taken by my Gay Rose Bush
description: Drew has a new house, and a new garden. But when he attempts to tame the wilderness, he discovers that there's a sentient, psychic rose bush in his yard that plans to use the garden to tame him instead!This sizzling erotic story of 4800 words contains bondage, spanking, anal, blowjobs, double penetration, and the dominance that only a psychic rose bush named Charles can provide.
author: Flint Ramrod
